overview: It's a whodunit, but everyone does it.  Think of it as Columbo meets Porn meets, the Olsens. Vivid's famous Love Twins, Lacey and Lyndsey get caught up in a web of crimes and misdemeanors, deceit and intrigue as adult's most awarded director, Paul Thomas, spins a big-budget detective tale you won't soon forget. It's the black comedy Twindom, where the sex is in two's and the audience is in stitches. You have the right to remain silent... but you won't...
title: Twindom
